body:
Comment 6: 
You don't need GOROOT_FINAL set unless you are building in one location but plan to
install the binaries in a different one (the GOROOT_FINAL).

A build from source executed in /opt/go should definitely produce binaries that use a
default GOROOT of /opt/go and also show paths in /opt/go in stack traces.  Are you sure
that the binaries you are running are a product of that build and not of some previous
install?  Maybe there is a forgotten entry in your PATH?
_Status changed to **WaitingForReply**._
